name: ImpossyBall Alpha V0.0.1
description:
ImpossyBall is that kind of game that makes you angry trying again and again to success for the victory, it was a personal physics project but I decided to publish as a game to see if the people could complete it!

You can control a jumping/rolling ball and you must go trough some obstacles to complete the level, there´re some physics objects that you have to learn to move around the map!

Is not 100% impossible but maybe you´ll notice a hard challenge to beat it. This is my first time publishing a game so I hope you like it and send me your thoughts about the game and if you found any bugs, glitches or gameplay problems.

I´d love any feedback and if you want to add something that you think is good to add it to the game feel free to contact me, I´ll try to work in that and include it into the next version of the game!

Enjoy it!!

If the Download doesn´t work try it to download from here:

Mega:

http://bit.ly/impossyballgame

Dropbox:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/070i6sqtnojzbp2/ImpossyBall%20Game%20Alpha%20V0.0.1.zi...
